nodes.text: The Neimoidian kreehawk was a black-feathered, predatory avian native to the forests of Cato Neimoidia. These large creatures had smooth sloping heads with reflective eyes that allowed them to see even in near darkness. They had razor-sharp talons and their massive wingspan was covered in black feathers that made it seem nearly the size of a small Human. Despite this being the case, kreehawks had the potential to reach great speeds and were extremely nimble animals.

A quarter of kreehawks were kept in the aviary of Darga the Hutt. These birds were trained to respond to Darga personally, but could also be controlled using a command whistle. Darga's kreehawks could attack on command, and were capable of killing and completely devouring a victim's remains.
